mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO, TITLE, CONTENTS, NOTICE_YN , REG_USER_NO, REG_DT, CHG_USER_NO, USER_NO, CHG_DT FROM NOTICE_INFO_A ORDER BY NOTICE_YN, NOTICE_NO DESC LIMIT 6;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE_INFO_A ( TITLE, NOTICE_YN, CONTENTS, USER_NO, REG_USER_NO, REG_DT, CHG_USER_NO, CHG_DT ) VALUES( #{title}, #{notice_yn}, #{contents}, #{user_no}, #{user_no}, NOW(), #{user_no}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO, TITLE, CONTENTS, NOTICE_YN , REG_USER_NO, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT, CHG_USER_NO, CHG_DT FROM NOTICE_INFO_A WHERE NOTICE_NO=#{notice_no} ORDER BY NOTICE_YN, REG_DT DESC
mapper.update: DELETE FROM NOTICE_INFO_A WHERE NOTICE_NO IN #{item}
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO, TITLE, CONTENTS, NOTICE_YN , REG_USER_NO, REG_DT, CHG_USER_NO, USER_NO, CHG_DT FROM NOTICE_INFO_A WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') ORDER BY NOTICE_YN, NOTICE_NO DESC LIMIT 6 OFFSET ${read_more};

SELECT N.NOTICE_NO, N.NOTICE_YN, N.TITLE, N.USER_NO, N.REG_USER_NO, DATE_FORMAT(N.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS REG_DT FROM NOTICE_INFO_A N WHERE N.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') ORDER BY N.NOTICE_YN ASC, N.NOTICE_NO DESC LIMIT 6;
